title: Cover Letter Placeholder Fields
description: Fields used to fill cover_letter_template.docx placeholders.

date.description: Display date for letter header (for example: February 17, 2026).

recipient_name_title.description: Recipient line, e.g. 'Jane Doe, Hiring Manager' or 'Hiring Manager'.

company_name.description: Company name as shown in address/body lines.

salutation_target.description: Salutation target, e.g. 'Jane Doe' or 'Hiring Manager at Acme'.

opening_focus_area.description: Phrase after 'focused on', matching role/domain emphasis.

stack_list.description: Compact tech stack phrase for paragraph 1.

project_summary.description: Project sentence that proves fit (API/systems/CI/CD as relevant).

project_ownership_list.description: Ownership scope list phrase (e.g. schema design, backend logic, deployment, iteration).

company_why.description: Why the company/role is compelling based on job posting.

role_scope_alignment.description: Role scope clause (enterprise systems, collaboration, CI/CD/reliability, APIs, etc.).

growth_focus_area.description: Skill area to deepen (for example backend Java/Spring, distributed systems, data platforms).

immediate_value_areas.description: Where immediate contribution is strongest (full-stack, APIs, databases, CI/CD, reliability).

team_name.description: Team/company reference used in closing sentence.
